abstract: The Rail returns to cover the 28th running of the Breeders' Cup World Championships, an event that has turned into a lucrative and truly global event.
snippet: The Rail returns to cover the 28th running of the Breeders' Cup World Championships, an event that has turned into a lucrative and truly global event.
lead_paragraph: They got money, $26 million in purses, and a record number of horses pre-entered - 193 of them were pre-entered Wednesday. We're talking the 28th running of the Breeders' Cup World Championships, an event that has turned into a lucrative and truly global event.

headline.main: Returning for a Breeders' Cup Overflowing With Story Lines
